title:
METHODS/STEPS
Begin with layer of sauce on bottom of crock-pot. Stir all remaining ingredients together. Place in crockpot and cook on low for 5 hours. ADDITIONAL TIPS
Ready in 5 hours
directions: Begin with layer of sauce on bottom of crock-pot. Stir all remaining ingredients together. Place in crockpot and cook on low for 5 hours.
ingredients: 1 box rigatoni, cooked only for 3 min
1 1/2 lb. of ground chuck, browned and drained
